events.text:
Look, Lemingway, I want treasure. I want to feel it against my rough, pinecone skin. 
Dude, [color=#fcc2e6]I love treasure[/color]. And we're close! I can feel it in my [wave amp=50 freq=2]bones[/wave]!
So, wait, what are you saying?

I'll stay here, where it's safe, and oversee this map. You run off into that scary jungle over there and find me some treasure! There's supposed to be an [color=#fcf155]ancient temple[/color] somewhere in there...
... Okay, I'll do it. You know, ever since I first met you, Ananna, I knew that ther-
Yep, off you go then, good luck! Just buzz me on the walkie if you need anything!
